title: Shadowfire Kindred has no tail!
body:
Hey Riot! 

Hopefully this is the place to put this!

I just bought the Shadowfire Kindred bundle (which is AWESOME btw) but noticed that Lamb's tail is missing on this skin. I thought I was imagining things so I used her classic skin in another game. Sure enough she has her little tail in that skin.

Just thought I would let you guys know if it was a big enough issue to warrant a change! Her rear end looks so bare without a lamb tail!

Fantastic new champ, Riot. Good job!

replies.body: Why are you looking at her butt in the first place?

Considering the limited amount of directions and the rather small model on the screen, a fair amount of your time in-game is probably going to be spent staring at her backside.

Besides, got a thing for ladies who'd sooner kill me than anything else.  Shit's haht.
Are you an Irelia main?
I am not. I am a... something.
Sona main who insta-bought DJ Sona skin.
We're getting closer.

Goddamnit I prepaid that skin! xD However, I didn't buy it for the skintight outfit she wears, I bought it because I like the theme of the skin, and I like the music. If I wanted to see tatas I'd just go to rule34, because if it exists....
This is pretty much how it went, haha. I was standing at blue on Red side waiting for it to spawn. Realized, hey... this lamb ain't got no tail. Oh well.
I wasn't lol. Just something I noticed at a glance.

ADMIT IT, YOU DON'T STARE DEATH IN THE FACE.

YOU EYE DEATH'S REAR, BECAUSE SHE HAS IT GOING ON!
I'm sure I'm not the only one who thinks she's kinda hot

Hey Arapod,

For this particular thematic, it's intended that she does not have a tail.
Why then?
It's a design choice we made for this skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jOJP8nEg,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-10-19T22:56:57.632+0000)
>
> It's a design choice we made for this skin.

Why even bother replying with this? Your initial post made it obvious that you chose for it to not have a tail - the guy was clearly interested in what was behind the choice but your post gave absolutely no new information.
There isn't a whole lot  to dive into - we felt it looked better without the tail for this thematic.

Why?

:3
They may have ditched it as part of the angel thematic. Don't see a tail in the splash so it's probably intentional.

But.

*Angel tail-feathers.*
Ah I didn't even think to look at the splash. Makes sense!
Bump
upvoted the hell out of this.
wut
Consistency is not in Riots vocabulary.

Yea, yea, don't tell me you didn't buy the skin for da butt

U dirty furry
Holy shit people get a laugh-o-matic
Perhaps you should try to stop complaining about this kind of detail in skins because its pretty much intentional.
Who cares?  Shit champ design, with a shit skin. Oh yeah furries, who are less than human.
